            int gen,
            double val,
            int typeProduct)
        Constructor Book: Creates a new Book object with the given parameters.
        Postconditions:
        A new Book object is created with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        indentifier - A String representing the identifier of the book. Must not be null.
        name - A String representing the name of the book. Must not be null.
        pagesNumber - An integer representing the number of pages in the book.
        publicationDate - A Calendar object representing the publication date of the book.
        url - A String representing the URL of the book.
        rd - A String representing the review of the book.
        gen - An integer representing the gender of the book.
        val - A double representing the value of the book.
        typeProduct - An integer representing the type of product.
